name: FlappyBirdGodot
description:
This is just a FlappyBird clone I made in Godot 3.5-rc1 from zero.

The goal here was just to complete the basic game mechanics and probably add some kind of twist or extra stuff in the future.

Be wary that the audio is a bit too loud as it was the last part I implemented. Lower your volume.

You can find a devlog in my website: Creating a FlappyBird clone in Godot 3.5 devlog 1

And you can check the source code in my GitHub: FlappyBirdGodot

Credits

  • Sprites by MegaCrash: flappy-bird-assets; just modified the names to be all lowercase because I like it that way.
  • Font by PoppyWorks: Silver.
  • Sound by meeq: FlappyBird-N64, which at the same looks like it's taken from 101soundboards.com, which either way at the end of the day the respective credit goes to .Gears, the original owners of the SFX and game idea.

License
